Activity: Log in and check emails. Review the documentation for the automated build process and make any necessary revisions.

Work on improving the automated build process by adding more sophisticated tests, such as integration tests and performance tests. These tests will help to catch more bugs early in the development cycle.
Integrate static analysis tools into the build process. These tools can automatically identify potential code quality issues and security vulnerabilities.
Configure the CI tool to automatically deploy the game to a test environment after a successful build. This will allow testers to easily access the latest version of the game.
Test the automated deployment process to ensure it is working correctly. Check for deployment errors and other issues. Troubleshoot any problems that arise.
Research tools that help in automating asset management. Consider asset validation and versioning tools that can be integrated in the build pipeline.
